title: Dealing With Debt Ft. Yanely Espinal
description:
This week, Berna is back to dig deep on a topic that can be a source of anxiety for many: debt. She starts off sharing her personal relationship with debt before being joined by Yanely Espinal aka MissBeHelpful to breakdown the topic even further. They get into potential sources of debt, and what to consider when borrowing money to prevent yourself from being stuck with ‘bad’ debt. We close out the show with the Public Forum, brought to you by Public.com, featuring listener-submitted questions all about saving. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to send in your questions! 
Thanks to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
